message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between sodium chloride and silver nitrate to form silver chloride and sodium nitrate?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between sodium chloride (NaCl) and silver nitrate (AgNO3) to form silver chloride (AgCl) and sodium nitrate (NaNO3) is:

NaCl (aq) + AgNO3 (aq) â†’ AgCl (s) + NaNO3 (aq)
